verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Wonderful, wonderful, newline Marvelous and wonderful newline What He has done for my soul! newline The half has never been told newline Oh, it is wonderful. newline It is marvelous and wonderful newline What Jesus has done for this soul of mine! newline The half has never been told.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The Savior has come in His mighty power, newline And spoken peace to my soul. newline And all of my life from that very hour, newline I've yielded to His control. newline I've yielded to His control.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 'Twas only a foretaste of joys divine newline In Canaan waiting for me; newline Where sweetest honey and milk and wine newline Were dripping from ev'ry tree newline Were dripping from ev'ry tree.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: From glory to glory He leads me on newline From grace to grace ev'ry day; newline And brighter and brighter the glory dawns newline While pressing my homeward way newline While pressing my homeward way.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: If fellowship here with my Lord can be newline So inexpressibly sweet newline Oh, what will it be when His face we see newline When 'round the white throne we meet. newline When 'round the white throne we meet.
